sqlMap.statement: SELECT MN.T_MDL_NM ,DMG.MDL_GRP_NM FROM SVC_CONFIG_MSTR SCM ,MDL_NM MN ,DS_MDL DM ,DS_MDL_GRP DMG WHERE SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SCM.SVC_CONFIG_MSTR_PK = #svcConfigMstrPk# AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MN.T_GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = MN.T_MDL_ID AND SCM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SCM.MDL_ID = DM.MDL_ID AND DM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DMG.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DM.MDL_GRP_ID = DMG.MDL_GRP_ID AND SCM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DMG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT FL.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM FSR_VISIT FV ,FSR_VISIT FL WHERE FV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND FV.SVC_TASK_NUM = #svcTaskNum# AND FV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND FV.FSR_NUM = FL.FSR_NUM AND FV.NEXT_FSR_VISIT_NUM = FL.FSR_VISIT_NUM AND FV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND FL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
